pages.about: About LocatioCommercium About us Gallery Process Service Reviews Vacancies Blog FAQ Pricelist Contact us Home About us Gallery Process Service Reviews Vacancies Blog FAQ Pricelist Contact us Your Trusted Partner in Commercial Real Estate At LocatioCommercium, we specialize in providing premier commercial real estate solutions tailored to meet your business needs. With years of industry experience, our dedicated team is committed to helping you find the perfect office, retail, or commercial space to support your growth and success. We pride ourselves on offering flexible leasing terms, prime locations, and unparalleled customer service. Partner with us and experience a seamless leasing process, expert guidance, and a trusted relationship built on transparency and excellence. Discover why businesses choose LocatioCommercium for their commercial real estate needs. Join Our Dynamic Team Explore Exciting Career Opportunities at LocatioCommercium Office Manager We are seeking an organized and proactive Office Manager to oversee daily administrative operations, manage office supplies, and support our team. Strong communication skills and experience in office management are essential. Property Consultant Join our team as a Property Consultant to assist clients in finding their ideal commercial spaces. The role involves conducting property tours, understanding client needs, and providing expert advice on real estate options. Marketing Specialist We are looking for a creative Marketing Specialist to develop and execute marketing strategies that increase brand awareness and drive property inquiries. Experience in digital marketing and content creation is preferred. Customer Support Representative As a Customer Support Representative, you will handle client inquiries, provide information about our services, and resolve any issues promptly. Excellent interpersonal skills and a customer-oriented approach are crucial for this role. Stay Informed with Our Insights Explore the Latest Trends and Tips in Commercial Real Estate Exciting New Office Spaces Available! Discover our latest listings for modern office spaces in prime locations. June 15, 2024 Top Tips for Retail Space Design Learn how to optimize your retail space for better customer experience and sales. June 20, 2024 Navigating Commercial Lease Agreements Understand the key terms and clauses in commercial lease contracts. June 25, 2024 FAQ What types of commercial properties do you offer? We offer a wide range of properties including office spaces, retail spaces, and other commercial properties tailored to meet your business needs. What is the minimum lease term? The minimum lease term typically starts at one year, but we offer flexible leasing options to accommodate different requirements. Are utilities included in the lease? Some of our lease agreements include utilities, while others do not. Please check the specific details for each property. Do you provide property management services? Yes, we offer comprehensive property management services to ensure your leased property is well-maintained and any issues are promptly addressed. Can I make modifications to the leased space? Modifications are generally allowed with prior approval. We encourage tenants to discuss their plans with us to ensure compliance with building regulations. How do I schedule a property tour? You can schedule a property tour by contacting us through our website or by calling our office. We will arrange a convenient time for you to visit and explore the property. pages.policy: Privacy Policy | LocatioCommercium About us Gallery Process Service Reviews Vacancies Blog FAQ Pricelist Contact us Home About us Gallery Process Service Reviews Vacancies Blog FAQ Pricelist Contact us Privacy Policy - LocatioCommercium Information We Collect We collect various types of information, including personal data such as your name, email address, phone number, and company details. We also collect data regarding your interactions with our website and services. How We Use Your Information Your information is used to provide and improve our services, communicate with you, process transactions, and comply with legal obligations. We also use your data to personalize your experience on our website and to send you relevant information and offers. Sharing Your Information We do not sell your personal data to third parties. We may share your information with trusted partners and service providers who assist us in delivering our services, under strict confidentiality agreements. Data Security We implement robust security measures to protect your data from unauthorized access, alteration, or disclosure. Our security practices include encryption, firewalls, and secure server facilities. Your Rights You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal data, as well as the right to restrict or object to certain data processing activities. To exercise these rights, please contact us at locatiocommercium@gmail.com. Data Retention We retain your personal data for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes outlined in this Privacy Policy, comply with legal obligations, and resolve disputes. Data no longer needed will be securely deleted. International Data Transfers Your personal data may be transferred to and processed in countries other than your own. We ensure that such transfers comply with applicable data protection laws and that your data remains protected. Children's Privacy Our services are not directed to individuals under 16. We do not knowingly collect personal data from children. If we become aware of such data, we will take steps to delete it. Third-Party Links Our website may contain links to third-party sites. We are not responsible for the privacy practices or content of these sites. We encourage you to review their privacy policies before providing any personal data. Changes to This Privacy Policy We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any significant changes by posting the new policy on our website. Your continued use of our services after such changes constitutes your acceptance of the updated policy. Legal Basis for Processing We process your personal data based on your consent, the necessity to perform a contract, compliance with legal obligations, and our legitimate interests in maintaining and improving our services. Your Consent By using our website and services, you consent to the collection, use, and sharing of your personal data as described in this Privacy Policy. Contact Information If you have any questions or concerns about this Privacy Policy or our data practices, please contact us at locatiocommercium@gmail.com. Data Protection Officer We have appointed a Data Protection Officer (DPO) to oversee our data protection practices. You can reach our DPO at locatiocommercium@gmail.com. User Responsibilities As a user, you are responsible for keeping your account information confidential and for any activity that occurs under your account. Please notify us immediately if you suspect any unauthorized use of your account. Governing Law This Privacy Policy is governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the jurisdiction in which LocatioCommercium operates. Any disputes arising from this policy will be resolved in the relevant courts of that jurisdiction. Data Breach Procedures In the event of a data breach, we will promptly notify affected users and relevant authorities in accordance with applicable laws. We will take all necessary steps to mitigate the impact of the breach and prevent future occurrences. Opt-Out Options You can opt out of receiving marketing communications from us at any time by following the unsubscribe instructions provided in our emails or by contacting us at locatiocommercium@gmail.com. Data Minimization We collect and process only the data necessary to fulfill the purposes outlined in this Privacy Policy. We strive to minimize the amount of personal data we collect and limit its use to what is essential for providing our services. User Consent for International Transfers By providing your personal data, you consent to its transfer, storage, and processing outside your country of residence, including to jurisdictions that may have different data protection laws than your own. Contact If you have any questions, concerns, or comments about our privacy practices or this policy, or if you would like to exercise your data rights or make a complaint, please contact us using the following information: locatiocommercium@gmail.com Privacy Home About us Gallery Process Service Reviews Vacancies Blog FAQ Pricelist Contact us
